SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Username" :SET &UC4RB_DMC_USERNAME# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_DMC_USERNAME#) :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DMC_USERNAME#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Hostname" :SET &UC4RB_DMC_HOST# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_DMC_HOST#) :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DMC_HOST#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Database Name" :SET &UC4RB_DMC_DBNAME# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_DMC_DBNAME#) :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DMC_DBNAME#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "DSN" :SET &UC4RB_DMC_DSN# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_DMC_DSN#) :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DMC_DSN#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Stream ID" :SET &UC4RB_DMC_DS_STREAM_ID# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_DMC_DS_STREAM_ID#) :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DMC_DS_STREAM_ID#
